name: nicassa-generator
description: CLI based code generator for Sequelize, Node, Typescript, Angular 2, Android, Swagger, ORM Lite
author: Harald Fielker <harald.fielker@gmail.com>

scripts.gentest-alltypes: cd test && cd alltypes && tsoa swagger
scripts.gentest-alltypes-optional: cd test && cd alltypesoptional && tsoa swagger
scripts.gentest-alltypes-array: cd test && cd alltypesarray && tsoa swagger
scripts.gentest-alltypes-array-optional: cd test && cd alltypesarrayoptional && tsoa swagger
scripts.gentest-complextypes: cd test && cd complextypes && tsoa swagger
scripts.gentest: npm run gentest-alltypes && npm run gentest-alltypes-optional && npm run gentest-alltypes-array && npm run gentest-alltypes-array-optional && npm run gentest-complextypes
scripts.test: npm run gentest && npm run testexec
